description: Begin, Menachem, 1913-1992 -- Photographs; Kadishai, Yechiel, 1923- -- Photographs
label: The honorary sign of the Golan Hights was given to the former Prime Minister Menachem Begin for his devotion and presenting the Law anexing the Golan Hights into Israel.
